Room.Name: North Hillborough Plaza
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large shopping plaza to the north of Hillborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: This large plaza hosts a number of small specialty shops. To the southwest is the Hillborough Adamantine Works where adamantine is formed into strong shields, weapons and armors. To the west is Deni's World of Spices. To the north is Jallud's Missing Persons, where people can leave messages for people believed to be lost or missing. To the east is the rowdy Crimson Tales Saloon, and to the southeast is the Lankshire Hall of Wonders.
